text: Breitenlohe is a part of the city Burghaslach, Bavaria, Germany. Breitenlohe is part of Neustadt an der Aisch-Bad Windsheim. ==Other websites== * Homepage of the castle == Literature == * Natascha Meuser: Schloss Breitenlohe: Architektur und Baugeschichte, DOM publishers, Berlin 2014, .
